Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GameStartingController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GameStartingController
public class GameStartingController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the interaction between client and server during the phase of waiting for Players to join a Game.

    void initialize​(GUIManager manager)  
    void notifyGameStarting()
    When the expected number of Players joined, allows the Player to click on the StartGame button so that the Game can start.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(GUIManager manager)
      Parameters:
      manager - the GUIManager to set the GameLobbyController manager attribute to

    • confirmPressed

      public void confirmPressed()
      Handles the pressing of the Confirm button.

    • confirmReleased

      public void confirmReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Confirm button. Notices the GUIManager that the Confirm button was clicked, putting this input on the messageQueue.

    • displayPlayerJoined

      public void displayPlayerJoined​(GameView game)
      Handles the displaying of the Players in the Game room, and informs the Player that he must wait for the other Players to join until the Game can start.
      Parameters:
      game - the GameView representing the current state of the Game

    • notifyGameStarting

      public void notifyGameStarting()
      When the expected number of Players joined, allows the Player to click on the StartGame button so that the Game can start.
